      • getSpiral

        public static java.lang.String getSpiral(java.lang.String f)
        returns all fieldIDs in the order of a spiral, beginning with the inputID and ending in the middle of the field. example: input: "N" output: "NIEFKOJ"

        does not work with water

        Parameters:
        f - the f
        Returns:
        the spiral
